alert.note: Alert for Auglaize; Hardin; Logan; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 22 at 7:35AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of Central Ohio and West Central Ohio, including the following counties, in Central Ohio, Union OH. In West Central Ohio, Auglaize, Hardin and Logan. * WHEN...Until 1045 AM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 735 AM EST, radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 1 inch are possible. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Bellefontaine, Richwood, Russells Point, Lakeview, Belle Center, West Mansfield, Chippewa Park, Northwood, Roundhead, Mount Victory, Rushsylvania, Huntsville, Ridgeway, Big Springs, Silver Creek, Mentzer, Byhalia, Mcmorran, Somersville and Lewistown.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. To report flooding, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
